_sText:
Fight to escape as you're randomly teleported to 3 of the 12 maps
=================================================================

Spawn -- Box with a Light in it
=======================================
- 30 second starting spawn and transitional area between levels to repurchase gear to prepare for the random teleporter

Level 1 -- Classic
==============
- Hold off the zombie in a classic Zombie Mod office until teleported to next level


Level 2 -- Open Field
===================
- Group up or run solo to survive the Slender Forest until teleported to next level 


Level 3 -- Fail Nade
==================
- Split up and hold both sides of the sewer or group as one until the zombie drain pipes open, land a nade in both pipes to flush the zombies away


Level 4 -- Carpet Escape
======================
- Run or take a magic carpet ride to escape the infected palace


Level 5 -- IceCap Escape
======================
- Listen well as you revisit the frozen wasteland and its to escape 1 of 3 ways


Level 6 -- City Night Escape
==========================
- Careful not to fall as you escape the skyscraper by taking an elevator ride to the helicopter rescue zone


Level 7 -- Zombie Death Run
=========================
- Survive the zombie traps and escape the temple before its curse gets reaches you


Level 8 -- Couch Escape
=====================
- The only way to escape is by guiding a couch to the exit tunnel by breaking the couch only barricades


Level 9 -- Interstellar Escape 9
==============================
- Escape the black hole along the interstellar railroad moving from train to train until you reach the Final Express


Level 10 -- Volcano Escape
=======================
- Hold off the zombies until you're able to activate the central alter by making it to all 4 sacrificial alters


Level 11 -- Green Hill Escape
==========================
- Escape this nostalgia trip by making it to the Goal Post


Level 12 -- Zomeal Escape (Boss)
=============================
- Fight against the evil empire to escape the falling kingdom in the clouds

Version b5
==========
- Major/Minor glitch and bug fixes

Version b6
==========
- Again Major/Minor glitch and bug fixes
